entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain or drizzle. Low minus 3.

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of rain mixed with snow. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon.

Wind becoming northeast 20 km/h late in the morning. High 6 with temperature falling to plus 2 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 4 in the morning. UV index 2 or low.
